title: Slow Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup Recipe
description: This chicken tortilla soup is made in the slow cooker for a no-fuss hearty soup with tomatoes, corn, and chiles, served with baked tortilla strips.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Tortilla Soup Recipes Slow Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup 4.7 (5,654) 4,053 Reviews 318 Photos This chicken tortilla soup tastes better than anything you can get at a restaurant. It's healthy, too! Don't let the long list of ingredients fool you. All you do is dump everything into the slow cooker and walk away. Garnish with grated Cheddar, avocados, and a splash of fresh lime juice. Submitted by Elena Updated on September 5, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 318 318 318 318 Prep Time: 30 mins Cook Time: 3 hrs Total Time: 3 hrs 30 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 pound shredded, cooked chicken 1 (15 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, mashed 1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers 1 medium onion, chopped 2 cloves garlic, minced 2 cups water 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth 1 teaspoon cumin 1 teaspoon chili powder 1 teaspoon salt ¼ teaspoon black pepper 1 bay leaf 1 (10 ounce) package frozen corn 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro 7 corn tortillas 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken, tomatoes, enchilada sauce, green chiles, onion, and garlic into a slow cooker. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour in water and chicken broth; season with cumin, chili powder, salt, pepper, and bay leaf. Stir in corn and cilantro. Cover and cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours or on High for 3 to 4 hours. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios When the soup is almost finished, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly brush both sides of tortillas with oil. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cut tortillas into strips, then spread on a baking sheet. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until crisp, 10 to 15 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle tortilla strips over soup before serving. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 7,350 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 262 Calories 11g Fat 25g Carbs 18g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 262 % Daily Value * Total Fat 11g 14% Saturated Fat 3g 13% Cholesterol 45mg 15% Sodium 893mg 39% Total Carbohydrate 25g 9% Dietary Fiber 4g 14% Total Sugars 4g Protein 18g 36% Vitamin C 21mg 23% Calcium 63mg 5% Iron 2mg 13% Potassium 472mg 10% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup 01 of 318 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 318 Photo by  My Hot Southern Mess 10/30/2023 I made this mostly as written. I used chicken broth instead of water. The soup was easy to put together and resulted in a basic chicken tortilla soup. I did make the homemade chicken strips but tortilla chips would have worked just as well.I would suggest canned diced tomatoes over mashing whole tomatoes (I made a mess with this part). 03 of 318 Photo by  Angel Jones 10/04/2023 Added some more seasoning and some lime to taste 😋 04 of 318 Photo by  Mrssuperk 10/20/2021 Really love this soup! I only had a large can of enchilada sauce - so used that and cut a bit of the chicken broth. I also added a can of black beans - because we like that. Otherwise followed recipe. 05 of 318 Photo by  David West 10/08/2021 06 of 318 Photo by  David West 10/08/2021 07 of 318 Photo by  Harelle 05/31/2021 08 of 318 Photo by  bulldog4 03/18/2021 09 of 318 Photo by  Brenda Shrable 02/08/2021 10 of 318 Photo by  ddockbob 01/07/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Slow Cooker Chicken Taco Soup 7,446 Ratings Healthier Slow-Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup 206 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup in the Slow Cooker 78 Ratings Southwest Black Bean Chicken Soup 86 Ratings Chile Chicken Chili 24 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup with Salsa 2,397 Ratings Creamy Chicken Tortilla Soup with RO*TEL 1 Rating Chicken Tortilla Soup in the Instant Pot 8 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup 425 Ratings Mexican Chorizo Black Bean Chili 1 Rating Easy and Tasty Chicken Tortilla Soup 76 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup IV 223 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup 2,058 Ratings Slow Cooker Shredded Chicken Chili 1 Rating Slow Cooker Pork Green Chili 5 Ratings Chicken Enchilada Slow Cooker Soup 431 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
